languages.text: "Но все еще тлела надежда, что я отыщу братьев живыми, не давала мне укрыть голову черным саваном скорби. А затем... помнишь, что ты сказал{mf||а}? Я опоздал. Пропащий Ульфар вновь опоздал".

"But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."
languages.original_text: "Но все еще тлела надежда, что я отыщу братьев живыми, не давала мне укрыть голову черным саваном скорби. А затем... помнишь, что ты сказал{mf||а}? Я опоздал. Пропащий Ульфар вновь опоздал".

traits.locale_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, ardiendo en lo más hondo, todavía albergaba esperanzas de encontrar vivos a mis hermanos, lo que evitaba que la negra mortaja del pesar cubriera mi cabeza. Pero entonces... ¿recuerda lo que me dijo? Dijo que había llegado tarde. Ulfar el Perdido llegó tarde. Otra vez».
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, ardiendo en lo más hondo, todavía albergaba esperanzas de encontrar vivos a mis hermanos, lo que evitaba que la negra mortaja del pesar cubriera mi cabeza. Pero entonces... ¿recuerda lo que me dijo? Dijo que había llegado tarde. Ulfar el Perdido llegó tarde. Otra vez».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “然而，在那一切之下，我的希望仍然闷燃着。我希望我的兄弟们还能平安无事，让我无需将象征悲伤的黑色裹尸布盖在头上。但后来……你还记得你对我了什么吗？你说我来得太晚了。迷途之人乌尔法来得太晚了，又一次来晚了。”
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: “然而，在那一切之下，我的希望仍然闷燃着。我希望我的兄弟们还能平安无事，让我无需将象征悲伤的黑色裹尸布盖在头上。但后来……你还记得你对我了什么吗？你说我来得太晚了。迷途之人乌尔法来得太晚了，又一次来晚了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、それでも兄弟たちを生きているうちに見つけるという希望が俺の中にくすぶっていた。だから悲しみに頭をうずめるようなことはしなかったんだ。だが…お前が俺に言ったことを覚えているか？手遅れだったと言ったよな。ウルファー・エバーロストは、またしても間に合わなかった」
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、それでも兄弟たちを生きているうちに見つけるという希望が俺の中にくすぶっていた。だから悲しみに頭をうずめるようなことはしなかったんだ。だが…お前が俺に言ったことを覚えているか？手遅れだったと言ったよな。ウルファー・エバーロストは、またしても間に合わなかった」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Mais au plus profond de mon désarroi couvait encore l'espoir de retrouver mes frères vivants, et c'est ce qui m'a empêché de rabattre sur ma tête le voile noir du chagrin. Pour autant... Vous vous rappelez ce que vous m'avez dit ? Qu'une fois de plus, Ulfar l'Égaré avait un train de retard. »
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: « Mais au plus profond de mon désarroi couvait encore l'espoir de retrouver mes frères vivants, et c'est ce qui m'a empêché de rabattre sur ma tête le voile noir du chagrin. Pour autant... Vous vous rappelez ce que vous m'avez dit ? Qu'une fois de plus, Ulfar l'Égaré avait un train de retard. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Doch unter allem glühte noch die Hoffnung, dass ich meine Brüder lebend finden würde, was mich davon abhielt, den schwarzen Schleier der Trauer über meinen Kopf zu ziehen. Doch dann ... Könnt Ihr Euch daran erinnern, was er zu mir gesagt hat? Ihr habt gesagt, ich sei zu spät gekommen. Ulfar Siegtnie war zu spät gekommen. Wieder einmal."
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Doch unter allem glühte noch die Hoffnung, dass ich meine Brüder lebend finden würde, was mich davon abhielt, den schwarzen Schleier der Trauer über meinen Kopf zu ziehen. Doch dann ... Könnt Ihr Euch daran erinnern, was er zu mir gesagt hat? Ihr habt gesagt, ich sei zu spät gekommen. Ulfar Siegtnie war zu spät gekommen. Wieder einmal."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

languages.text: "Her şeye rağmen bir gün kardeşlerime sapasağlam kavuşma umudu kalbimde için için tütüyordu. O yüzden kedere teslim olmadım. Fakat sonra... Bana dediklerini hatırlıyor musun? Çok geç kaldığımı söyledin. Ulfar Hepgaip geç kalmıştı. Yine."
languages.original_text: "But still smouldering under all was the hope that I would find my brothers alive, which stopped me from drawing the black shroud of sorrow over my head. But then... Do you remember what you said to me? You said I was too late. Ulfar Everlost was too late. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Her şeye rağmen bir gün kardeşlerime sapasağlam kavuşma umudu kalbimde için için tütüyordu. O yüzden kedere teslim olmadım. Fakat sonra... Bana dediklerini hatırlıyor musun? Çok geç kaldığımı söylemiştin. Ulfar Hepgaip geç kalmıştı. Yine."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
